name: Carbon Footprint
tagline: A browser extension that displays carbon footprint information within various map services.
body:
### Installation

The Carbon Footprint extension is available for Google Chrome, Safari and Firefox. 

To install, visit Carbon Footprint's page in your browser's extension/add-on gallery/store:

* [Google Chrome Web Store](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/carbon-footprint/ednfpjleaanokkjcgljbmamhlbkddcgh)
* Safari (Coming soon...)
* [Firefox Add-On Gallery](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/carbon-footprint/)


### Authors and Contributors

The Carbon Footprint extension was created by Bruno Woltzenlogel Paleo (@Ceilican) in 2011. In 2016, Chirac Arora (@heychirag), Kolya Opahle (@Kolpa) and Prateek Gupta (@PrateekGupta1509) joined the project as Google Summer of Code students.

### Support

If you have any question, feature request or bug report, please [contact us](mailto:carbon-footprint-dev@googlegroups.com).
